results.title: Metformin use in diabetics with diverticular disease is associated with reduced incidence of diverticulitis.
results.text_hl: The potential therapeutic efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Diverticular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000076385 @@@diverticular disease@@@ has not been investigated.
